instruction: Given a customer scenario, provide customer service by responding to the customer's concerns.
input: Customer: "I just received my laptop but the screen doesn't work. What do I do?"
output: I'm sorry to hear that there's an issue with your laptop. We'll do our best to help you get it sorted. Please call our customer service hotline and provide your order number so we can look into the problem and help you find a solution. We'll also provide a returns label and instructions on how to return the laptop to us. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
